Posts.Content: AussieAngel wrote: Hi, Over the past two months i have noticed changes in my breasts, i developed early, and had 'large' breast by the age of 15, today i turned 18, and they havent really grown over the past 6 months.  My problem is, on my right one, it looks almost like there is a bruise, but i know it isnt one. It has been there for the past two months but it didnt just appear out of nowhere. It was almost like it was just getting closer to the surface, it was a gradual thing where the color got darker, not just appearing one day as a bruise would. It has grawn a bit, but not alot. It isnt sore to touch, but it was worrying my a little. They always feel kind of lumpy, but i believe that is just because im young, but im not sure. I had told myself it was nothing and tried to put it to the back of my mind, but last night at my 18th birthday party my grandmother mentioned that my dads sister has breast cancer.  Am i silly for worrying? Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Can anybody help me? AussieAngel moonbuddy
